""Job Description:We are on the lookout for a talented and innovative Video Editor with expertise in animation and a flair for storytelling, to join us on a journey of creating engaging e-learning courses, captivating social media content, and informative YouTube videos. This role is ideal for someone who is passionate about turning raw footage into polished, educational, and entertaining visuals that resonate with audiences.What You'll Do:Video Editing: You'll be responsible for editing and assembling recorded raw material into a suitable, finished product ready for broadcasting. The material may include camera footage, dialogue, sound effects, graphics, and special effects.Animation Creation: Some projects will require simple yet effective animations. While custom animation skills are welcome, you can also utilize explainer video software to create engaging animations that help illustrate concepts and tell stories.Color Correction & Enhancement: Ensure that our videos are visually appealing with consistent color and quality, enhancing the overall look and feel of the content.Content Stabilization: Utilize Sony Catalyst for video stabilization to ensure smooth, professional-quality footage, primarily shot on a Sony ZV-E10 camera.Stock Video Integration: Seamlessly integrate stock videos into projects. While we prefer to shoot original content or use free resources, we're open to purchasing stock videos or images if necessary.Project Details:The videos will range from vlog-style and interview-style to talking head videos, aimed at educational and promotional purposes.Each video will be approximately 2-4 minutes long.The project will kick off with a test job consisting of 1 animation explainer video and 1 YouTube video, for which scripts and concepts will be provided.Who You Are:Proficient in video editing and animation software, with a preference for candidates familiar with Sony Catalyst.Creative and capable of interpreting a story or concept to bring it to life visually.Experience in creating e-learning content, social media videos (TikToks, reels), and YouTube videos.Able to source and effectively use stock video content, with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.Looking for a long-term collaboration, willing to grow and evolve with the project.How to Apply:Please submit your proposal including:Your bid per video.A detailed portfolio showcasing your video editing and animation work.A brief description of your experience with e-learning content, if applicable.Any previous experience with Sony cameras and Sony Catalyst for stabilization.This project is not just about technical skills; it's about creativity, storytelling, and the ability to captivate an audience. If you're passionate about making impactful videos and ready for a long-term collaboration, we'd love to hear from you.Pricing & Proposal Details:For this project, we're looking for clarity and simplicity in pricing, which is why we're requesting all applicants to provide a flat rate quote per video. This will help us understand your pricing structure upfront and ensure that we're on the same page regarding budgeting for the project.When submitting your proposal, please include:Your flat rate per video: Specify your cost for each video, considering that each piece will be between 2-4 minutes long. This rate should encompass all the tasks mentioned, from editing and color correction to animation and integrating stock footage.This approach will allow us to focus on creating high-quality content together without worrying about fluctuating costs. Your quote will play a significant role in the selection process, as we value transparency and fairness in collaboration.We're excited to hear from you and see your pricing proposals. ""- Indicator / strategy conditions need to work individually as well- multi time frame analysisBuy Signal Conditions:• RSI is in oversold range (below a certain threshold, e.g., RSI 30).• Bullish divergence is detected between price and an oscillator (e.g., RSI).• OBV (On-Balance Volume) is trending upwards, indicating increasing buying pressure.• Price is trading above the EMA (Exponential Moving Average), suggesting bullish momentum.Sell Signal Conditions:• RSI is in overbought range (above a certain threshold, e.g., RSI 70).• Bearish divergence is detected between price and an oscillator (e.g., RSI).• OBV is trending downwards, indicating increasing selling pressure.• Price is trading below the EMA, suggesting bearish momentum.Toggling Conditions:• The indicator should provide the ability to toggle specific conditions on and off. For example, I should be able to enable or disable the RSI, OBV, and EMA conditions individually based on my preference. This flexibility will allow me to customize the indicator according to different market conditions and trading strategies.Adjustable Parameters:• It’s essential that the parameters for each condition are adjustable within the indicator’s settings. For instance, I should be able to specify the RSI range for oversold and overbought conditions (e.g., RSI ranging from 30 to 40 for oversold), as well as adjust other parameters such as the length of the EMA period or the sensitivity of the divergence detection.Examples of Adjustable RSI Ranges:• In particular, for the RSI condition, it would be beneficial to specify ranges such as 30-40 for oversold and 60-70 for overbought, allowing for more precise customization of trading signals based on RSI levels.Posted On: February 14, 2024 04:01 UTCCategory: Scripting & AutomationSkills:Pine Script, PythonSkills: Pine Script, PythonCountry: Australia""

""Advanced Machine Learning Specialist for Stock Market Trading Analysis (POC Submission Required)**Job Overview:**We are on the lookout for a deeply skilled Machine Learning Specialist to spearhead the development of a Proof of Concept (POC) for an innovative machine learning application tailored for stock market trading analysis. This pivotal project is an integral component of a Request for Proposal (RFP) aimed at launching a comprehensive trading system backed by $25M in capital. The selected candidate will undertake responsibilities encompassing data gathering, the creation of diverse machine learning models, and rigorous backtesting, forward testing, and optimization efforts. The culmination of this project involves crafting a detailed report, devising a scalable solution architecture, and delivering a succinct presentation that highlights the findings and suggests a viable solution.**Critical Project Phase: POC Submission**To be considered for the full-scale project, applicants must first submit a Proof of Concept (POC) that demonstrates their proficiency and innovative approach to solving the challenges posed by stock market trading analysis using machine learning technologies. This POC is a mandatory step to assess the candidate's capabilities and alignment with the project's goals.**POC Requirements:**- **Data Collection Mini-Project:** Gather a small but relevant dataset from publicly available financial market sources. Clean and prepare this data for analysis.- **Model Development:** Develop a simplified machine learning model that demonstrates your ability to predict stock market trends or prices. Explain your choice of model, features, and the rationale behind your approach.- **Preliminary Results:** Provide initial backtesting results showcasing the model's performance. Include any insights or observations from this phase.- **Conceptual Solution Architecture:** Outline a basic solution architecture that could scale this model for larger datasets and real-time analysis.- **Short Presentation:** Prepare a brief presentation (5-10 slides) summarizing your POC approach, findings, and how it can be scaled to meet the project's requirements.**Full Project Responsibilities:**Upon successful evaluation of the POC, the candidate will be tasked with:- Extensive data collection and cleaning from varied sources.- Building and training comprehensive machine learning models for in-depth stock market trading analysis.- Detailed backtesting, forward testing, and optimization to refine model performance.- Developing a scalable solution architecture for a $25M capital deployment trading system.- Compiling a comprehensive report and a presentation that encapsulates the project's scope, findings, and the proposed scalable solution.**Application Process:**To apply, please submit the following:- A cover letter highlighting your machine learning project experiences, particularly in stock market analysis.- Your resume/CV, detailing relevant skills and accomplishments.- Examples or case studies of similar projects you've spearheaded.- A brief proposal that outlines your envisioned approach for this project, including any initial model or technique preferences.- **Your POC submission** as outlined above, demonstrating your capability to tackle this project's challenges.**Note:** Only applications accompanied by a completed POC will be considered for the full project engagement. This is your opportunity to showcase your expertise, creativity, and problem-solving skills in the realm of machine learning and stock market analysis. POCs are required for RFP submission.We eagerly anticipate your innovative solutions and how they might redefine our trading strategies through cutting-edge machine learning methodologies.Hourly Range: $75.00-$400.00Posted On: February 14, 2024 03:56 UTCCategory: Full Stack DevelopmentSkills:Python, Stock Market, Trading Automation, Solution Architecture, Software DesignSkills: Python, Stock Market, Trading Automation, Solution Architecture, Software DesignCountry: United States""

Start with an acknowledgement that this is a difficult decision first b/c they can’t provide care and second b/c there are so many options.There are 3 ways to find home care:Referral Site – these are large sites with long lists of providers, but little support. Qualifying the c-g is up to the user.National Company – these take more of an interest in you and do provide some service, but they are national and do not know the area, and you will never speak to the same person twice.Local Agency – these provide highly personal service and do the work for you. They either have c-g’s as employees or work with contractors as we do. High level of service and just as affordable as the other options.Things to be aware of when looking for a c-gCertification and experience – some providers have neitherBackground checks – the c-g have access to your home so must be trustyReliability – no shows and late arrivals are common, agencies give you a point of contact when this happensYou may want to cover the variety of care available. 24/7 care for a bedridden person is different than 3-4 hours a couple of times a week just to provide some extra help.Key Termshow to find a c-ghow to get home health care for parentshow to find a c-g for elderlyhow to hire a c-ghow to find a live in c-gIf you find this article is a little short then you can add a section based on this key word “caregiver interview questions”. ""This project aims to enhance security on a legacy Linux server by disabling outdated and vulnerable SSL/TLS protocols and implementing more robust encryption standards. Due to the sensitive nature of the systems involved, testing must be done in an isolated lab environment that replicates the production server configuration.The initial vulnerability assessment found the server permits connections using SSL 2.0 and 3.0, protocols that are no longer considered secure. To strengthen protections, these will need to be disabled on the server configuration. Additionally, the assessment recommends migrating to TLS 1.2 as the minimum encryption standard, using cipher suites that provide adequate security.The contractor's role will be to test the environment to mirror the production Linux server. Thorough testing is then required to validate all critical business services and applications continue running as expected with the proposed SSL/TLS changes implemented. Once verified, recommendations for applying the same upgrades to the live production server in a planned migration can be provided.The overall goal is to bolster security by eliminating use of outdated and vulnerable protocols while ensuring minimum disruption to operations. Configuring the isolated lab system and thoroughly verifying compatibility and operations across applications is key before any changes go live.Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00Posted On: February 19, 2024 13:55 UTCCategory: Information SecuritySkills:Vulnerability Assessment, SSL, Linux, Internet Protocol SecuritySkills: Vulnerability Assessment, SSL, Linux, Internet Protocol SecurityCountry: Pakistan""

Ideally, a fixed rate would be preferable, though an hourly rate will likely get capped per hour per week.This isn't my first rodeo.So, what's the project about? All I can divulge is it's set in a post-apocalyptical environment. It's relatively low-key, so don't think this could be on the scale of a Mad Max set. There are 11 pages to the script, and I'm the sod who'll be directing it.Any interested applicants in applying should have a portfolio of at least two works for my consideration. ""Set up a digital asset exchange with OpenDAX, configuring wallets, deposits, purchasing of digital assets, and customizing for Digital Assets with Escrow (DAE):Setting Up OpenDAX1. Environment Setup:- Install prerequisites: Docker, Docker Compose, Ruby, Rails.- Clone the OpenDAX repository from GitHub.2. Exchange Configuration:- Update `config/app.yml` with exchange details.- Set currencies, markets, and trading pairs in `config/seed/currencies.yml`, `config/seed/markets.yml`, and `config/seed/trading_pairs.yml`.3. Database Setup:- Initialize the database and load seed data.- Configure settings in `config/database.yml`.4. Wallet Integration:- Set up wallet services for supported cryptocurrencies.- Configure wallet settings in `config/seed/wallets.yml`.5. User Interface Customization:- Modify front-end components for branding and design.- Use React components and CSS for customization.6. Exchange Deployment:- Use Docker Compose to deploy services.- Test functionality and ensure all services are running correctly.7. Security Implementation:- Set up SSL certificates and two-factor authentication (2FA).- Regularly update software for security patches.8. Launch and Monitoring:- Open exchange to the public and onboard users.- Monitor performance, security, and user activity.Configuring Wallets and Trading1. User Registration and Wallet Creation:- Users sign up and automatically get a wallet for each supported cryptocurrency.2. Depositing Money:- Integrate a payment gateway for fiat currency deposits.- (Note: Cryptocurrency deposits are not supported in this setup.)3. Purchasing Digital Assets:- Users place buy orders for digital assets.- The matching engine executes trades, and assets are transferred to the user's wallet.Customizing for Digital Assets with Escrow (DAE)1. Define DAE as a Tradable Asset:- Add DAE as an asset in `config/seed/currencies.yml`.- Create a market pairing DAE with USD in `config/seed/markets.yml`.2. Modify the Trading Interface:- Customize the UI to accommodate DAE trading.- Implement order placement for DAE.3. Implement Escrow Mechanism:- Modify the matching logic to move funds to an escrow account for DAE orders.- Develop a mechanism for escrow release once the DAE is confirmed as released.Considerations- Ensure robust security measures are in place, especially for escrow transactions.- Thoroughly test the modified trading engine and escrow mechanism.Budget: $1,100Posted On: February 19, 2024 03:42 UTCCategory: Full Stack DevelopmentSkills:Docker, Ruby, ReactSkills: Docker, Ruby, ReactCountry: United States""

content: Delivered threads, change, months-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""Threads of Change is a 9-months long projectVOICE is an environmental NGO that works around the issue of waste management and prevention by tackling production and consumption habits. This project focuses on the fashion industry.The deliverable of our project is a dynamic online platform, functioning as a virtual library curated to aggregate comprehensive knowledge regarding the intersection of fashion and sustainability. This website serves a dual purpose: to debunk myth and misconceptions about the fashion industry, while empowering individuals with actionable insights.This website is mostly informational and will be comprised of articles and blog posts for the most part, divided into 3 main categories:1. Present and make the multifaceted impacts of the fashion industry understandable and clear. We will deal with the implications of the entire supply chain, focusing on the connections between consumption patterns and the environmental and societal consequences of fashion production and distribution.2. The second main section is about helping people navigate this complicated landscape and invite them to engage with sustainable fashion.3. Finally, as we try to bring about a new vision for fashion, anchored in sustainability and principles like sufficiency and wellbeing, there will be an entire section dedicated to showcasing already existing alternatives and address the important things to consider for stakeholders in the sector that would like to incorporate such considerations in their business. We will offer prompts that envision what the fashion industry could look like in a world guided by sustainability.In essence, the deliverable—a comprehensive and user-friendly website—will serve as an invaluable bank of knowledge, equipped with practical tools, and inspirational examples, all aimed at transforming the way individuals perceive, engage with, and contribute to fashion.1. UX and website planningResearch:• Target audience.Our main audience are the most frequent purchasers: mostly young (-35 years old) women (see EPA report on purchasing habits for clothing in Ireland). These people are very familiar with fashion related content, but mostly marketing and mainstream ones. Not so much sustainable fashion.Study the landscape and the target audience to know about their user profile and contribute to how we articulate the information displayed on the website (proposition in term of content as well).• Industry overview:Analyse the industry’s current trends and emphasis, styles… To identify how we can be most effective and relevant to the public.• Website layout and design.• Design website and prototyping for the webdevelopper.2. Graphic designLogoThis website will need a strong graphic identity that reflects the following characteristics:• Modern but simple: aligning with the sector’s general aesthetic.• Focus on sustainability and supporting the imagining of a fashion that contributes to well-being and has environmental and social benefits.• The link and capacity to blend within VOICE’s ecosystem.Considering the age bracket of our audience, this will be a mobile first platform.We will need a number of templates for social media that could be displayed on VOICE’s platform. The project will not have its own SM accounts.• Instagram posts (different types)• Guides• Event calendar and eventsIdeal time frame:We aim to dedicate a month, working at a full-time capacity, around the months of April and May to complete this task.As we are a non-profit, our budget is quite tight.Please contact us with a quote.Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00Posted On: February 13, 2024 12:38 UTCCategory: Web DesignSkills:Figma, Prototyping, UI/UX Prototyping, Web Design, Graphic Design, Logo Design, Website AssetSkills: Figma, Prototyping, UI/UX Prototyping, Web Design, Graphic Design, Logo Design, Website AssetCountry: Ireland""

That means if you're unfortunately getting a deadly disease, there's no chance that you will survive without miracle. Now, AI powered drug discovery provides a strong solution to this devastating issue. It accelerates the process for years and significantly cuts the R&D cost , which makes possible for patients to hope for effective therapeutics. Over the past few years, with Insilico Medicine's proprietary Pharma.AI platform, they've developed a novel therapeutic for a deadly disease: Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis.
